pages.text: Storage Drawers offers a modular and visually pleasing way to store items in Minecraft. $(br2)Organize your items efficiently using drawers, upgrades, and controllers.
Craft drawers in various sizes to fit your needs, from single-item full drawers to multi-item half drawers. $(br2)Upgrade them with capacity, void, and other enhancements to maximize storage.
Use a Drawer Controller to connect multiple drawers into a unified storage network. $(br2)Add a Controller Slave to extend your network's reach, and link it all up with Trim blocks.
Storage Drawers is the perfect solution for keeping your storage tidy and your items easily accessible. $(br2)Say goodbye to messy chests and hello to organized storage bliss!
